name: carclub_carclub
description:
You have opened up a new car club in town, but if you want it to survive, you must beat the competition.

Drive your cars around to claim territory in the city. Earn more money as you purchase more cars. Rear end the opponent's cars, but be careful they don't do the same to you.

Whoever has the most territory at the end of 40 turns wins!

Thanks Cole for making the cars.

Also thanks to Ajay Karat for his city builder 3D models: https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/
